alert.note: Alert for Hale; Lowndes; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Autauga, southwestern Chilton, northeastern Marengo, central Perry, southeastern Hale, northwestern Lowndes and central Dallas Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Billingsley to near Paul M Grist State Park to near Greensboro Municipal Airport. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Marion, Greensboro, Uniontown, Selmont-West Selmont, Autaugaville, White Hall, Newbern, Billingsley, Faunsdale, Benton, Bogue Chitto, Vaiden, Tyler, Autauga County Airport, Mulberry, Paul M Grist State Park, Memorial Stadium and Burnsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
